Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Koo shindalakana ninanyu mbu enywe Abandu mulalaama Shetani tawe , toto ye ni Omusuku wenyu owabulafu
Ni mbu munaame esie ino niyo injila ingololofu
No khubwatoto ye yakosia omukanda omukhongo mwinywe , koo shimwaparangakhwo tawe
Mana ino niyo Jahanam yamwalakungwa
Injilemwo lelo shingala mwakhayanga
Olwa lelo khutimbia eminwa chiabu ne imikhono chiabu chiboole ninafu ne ibilenje biabu birusie obuloli khu kalia kabakholanga
Ne khwenyanga khwakhatimbiyie tsimoni tsiabu baba nibashilanila injila halali bakhalutsi barie
Ne	khwenyanga khwakhabakalukhaniye ifwani abali hao butswa, mana shibakhanyalile okhutsia nohomba okhukalukha tawe
Ne wakhukofusia khumukalusinjia inyuma mubulonji mana koo shibakhaparangakhwo
Ne shikhwamwechesia [Muhammad] tsinyimbo tawe ne kano shikenyekhana khuye tawe, shino ni eshitsulisio nende Ikurani iretsanga abulafu
Khulwo khwikanyilisilia ushili omulamu ne likhuwa libure khubakhayi
Ko shibalolanga mbu khwabaloonjela okhurulana khumilimo chie mikhono chiefu tsisolo tsiemiruko, etsia barukanga
Ne nikhubanguyisilia etsindi mutsisolo etso tsiabaninangakhwo ne etsindi batsiliitsaanga
Ne bo banyoolanga mutsisolo etso obukhonyi nende ebinywebwa kho mana shibakhupanga orio tawe
Ne batila Abanyasaye bandi habundu wa Nyasaye mbu khobanyoole obukhoonyi
Shibalinyala okhubakhonya halali abo nibo baliba Abasikari babu olwabali khwitsila
Manaamakhuwakabukalakhubelesia tawe, toto efwe khwamanya kabafisanga nende kabaretsaanga habulafu
Ne Omundu shalolanga mbu khwamuloonga okhurulana nende indonyande ya amatsi kolwibulo mana toto ye niye omuseeri wahabulafu
Ne alakhuchelasilia naye yebilila okhulongwa khukhwe -mana naboola mbu : “ ni wina oyo ulilamusia ebikumba nibimalile okhubulungukha?”
Boola mbu; “ alibilamusia ulia wabiloonga olwokhuranjilila, naye ni Omumanyi muno wabuli okhuloonga khwosi”
Ulia wabakholela okhunyoola omulilo okhurula khumusala omubisi mana nimunyoola okhubwana omulilo okhurulana ninakwo
Koo waloonga likulu nende eshialo shanyala okhulonga bafwana ninabo? Khulwa shina naye niye Omuloonji Omukhongo Owamachesi muno
Toto likhuwa lilie niyenya eshindu ashiboolela butswa mbu: “ ba’’ ni shiba
Mana yatswenukha ulia wobwami bwa buli eshindu buli mumukhono kukwe, ne ewuwe niwo amulikalusibwa
Nditsuba khubemaanga khulunyaali
Nende khubalia bakaninjia amabii
Nende khubalia basoomanga obwitsulisio
Toto Nyasaye wenyu nimulala butswa
Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio. Ne ni Nyasaye Omulesi we ebukwe tsiosi
Toto efwe khwarona likulu liahambi khutsing’ining’ini
Khulwokhulinda okhurulana nende buli Shetani Omukhayi
Balanyoola okhuwulila ebilonje bioluyali, ne baloondungwayo buli mumbeka
Baloondungwa ne bali nende eshinyasio shilawa
Halali ulia upusulanga eshindu eshititi , ne mana shimulondangakhwo eshikhupo shimesamesanga
Barebekhwo mbu koo abo ni baloongwa okhuloongwa okhutinyu muno okhushila ebilonje bindi biakhwaloonga? Toto efwe khwabaloonga okhurulana khuliloba litilanga
Owukanga nabo bakholanga omubayo
Ne nibetsulisibwa shibetsulilanga tawe
Ne nibalola eshimanyisio nibakhola omubayo
Ne baboola mbu: “kano shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali ni obulosi butswa buli habulafu.”
Mbunikhufwanikhumalileokhubaliloba nende ebikumba, kho toto khulilamusibwa
Kata bapapa befu bakhale
Boola mbu: “mmm! nanyu nimuli batutuyibwe .”
Eyo oluyoka lulikhupwa lulala butswa, ni hawo niwo abalilola
Baliboola mbu: “ abayiee, ino niyo inyanga yomurungo.”
Ino niyo inyanga yeyindukho yamwakhayanga
